text: Jayam is a 2006 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Sonu Sisupal, starring Kalabhavan Mani and Rekha in the lead roles. http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/3692/malayalam/jayam/index.htm ==Cast== * Anandaraj as Bharathan * Rekha as Banumathi * Kiran as Javed * Anil Murali as CI Sugunan * Janardhanan * Nandan as Nandan Gowda * Neethu S Nair as Lakshmi * Ottappalam Pappan as School teacher * Sreejith Ravi as Dennis * Biyon as Kiran *Vinayakan as Saheer *Meena Ganesh *Salu Koottanad as Chakrapani ==References== ==External links== * Category:2006 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Jayam (2006 film)
